subject: RE: [junit] problem with junit

Hi Satinder,

This is a cactus related issue, not a junit one so the cactus mailing
list would be more appropriate. That said, the error seems to be that
you are missing the cactus jar in your weapps's WEB-INF/lib directory.
Please continue the discussion on the cactus user mailing list.

Thanks
-Vincent

> Subject: [junit] problem with junit
